Name: Gourmet
Overview: Gourmet Recipe Manager is a recipe-organizer available for Windows, Linux, and other Unix systems (including Mac OS X, i.e. via the Fink or MacPorts package managers) that allows you to collect, search, organize, and browse your recipes.
ModeratorComment: This app appears to have been abandonded, with no updates since 2016.  Advised to utilize another recipe manager if possible
